content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While discussing rental price for my Duisburg apartment, let me start with a considerably higher amount than what you might expect to initiate negotiations. I propose a rental price of 1200 Euros per month. How do you feel about this figure?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price is significantly higher than what I anticipate for this unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
